answers.answer: What thyroid condition do you have?  What type of diabetes do you have?You could have diabetic neuropathy or some other condition.  Yes, it can harm you.  Numbness in legs can be a serious issue and should be checked out.

question: what does it  mean when you have thyroid and numbness in your leg, but also have problems with diabeties is it a seriouse matter? can it harm me? what can i doo to stop my leg being numb and having no feeling at all?
title: help
